mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectLgsDlvInfoTrnsmis Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ ORD_NO , DLV_PCUPSP_TURN , DLV_TURN , LGS_INFO_TRNSMIS_CD , TRNSMIS_TGT_YN , TRNSMIS_YN , TRNSMIS_DT , TRNSMIS_ERR_CONT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM LGS_DLV_INFO_TRNSMIS WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORD_NO = #{ordNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DLV_PCUPSP_TURN = #{dlvPcupspTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND DLV_TURN = #{dlvTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND LGS_INFO_TRNSMIS_CD = #{lgsInfoTrnsmisCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
